attributes.action: To Stop the behind closed doors for sporting events in wales
attributes.additional_details: Why can’t a vaccine pass be used in these events we have been asked to get vaccinated and have a booster wear masks social distance we have done everything is asked for over the past 2 years covid is here to stay it’s still going to be here in years to come we have just got to learn to live with it is there any scientific evidence that you will catch it at sporting events more than in a supermarket or shop
attributes.background: To stop the playing behind closed doors for sporting events in wales

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here:
https://petitions.senedd.wales/
